name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Full Stack Developer with 8 years of experience, specializing in high-performance solutions with a strong emphasis on **React**, **Vue**, and **Angular**. Proven ability to design and implement scalable applications utilizing **Spring Native**, **MongoDB**, **Oracle**, and **Redis**. Experienced in applying architectural patterns including **CQRS**, **Event Sourcing**, **SAGA**, and **Circuit Breaker** strategies to enhance application resilience. Proficient in orchestrating containerized environments with **Kubernetes** and **Rancher** to ensure seamless deployment and monitoring.
Additionally, I possess deep expertise in developing enterprise-grade platforms across healthcare and financial sectors, utilizing technologies such as **Node.js**, **Python**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. My qualifications include integrating machine learning capabilities, leading cloud solutions on **Azure** and **AWS**, and implementing CI/CD automation to streamline development processes. Skilled in compliance adherence with standards like HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2, I am adept at project management with tools like **Jira** and **Bitbucket**.

Implemented robust data storage solutions with **MongoDB**, **Redis**, and **Oracle** to optimize the performance of large-scale applications, ensuring efficient data retrieval and management.
Utilized event-driven architecture with **Kafka** to manage real-time data streams, facilitating responsive application designs and improved user interactions.

Implemented monitoring and logging strategies to ensure reliability and performance of applications, utilizing modern tools for real-time insights into system behaviors.
Conducted code reviews and provided technical guidance to junior developers, fostering a culture of continuous learning and best practices in software engineering.
Delivered complex data visualization tools and dashboards to facilitate operational insights, employing advanced techniques to enrich user engagement and decision-making processes.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to enhance application capabilities through reactive programming paradigms, improving responsiveness to user interactions and system events.

Designed, implemented, and orchestrated ETL pipelines utilizing **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Data Factory** for efficient batch and real-time data ingestion from multiple sources, maintaining data integrity across **MongoDB** and **Oracle** databases.
Created and maintained real-time monitoring systems, leveraging **Keycloak** for authentication and transactions, and **D3.js** with **Power BI Embedded** for effective data visualization and reporting.
Implemented **Circuit Breaker**, **Retry**, and **Bulkhead** patterns to enhance system reliability and resilience in microservices architecture, effectively managing errors and ensuring high system performance.
Leveraged **Kubernetes** and **Rancher** for container orchestration, facilitating continuous integration and deployment pipelines to improve operational efficiency and reduce downtime.
Engaged in **Reactivo programación** to implement efficient logging and monitoring solutions, improving system observability through tools like **Jira** and **Bitbucket** for issue tracking and version control.
Instrumented AI/ML solutions for fraud detection using **scikit-learn** and **XGBoost**, rigorously analyzing financial transaction data to identify anomalies and mitigate risks.
Developed machine learning pipelines for critical financial use cases, such as credit scoring and transaction classification, integrating directly into backend services for immediate impact.

• Enhanced system reliability through the implementation of **Circuit Breaker** and **Retry** patterns, minimizing downtime and improving overall system robustness.
• Utilized **Jira** and **Bitbucket** for project management and version control, fostering collaboration and ensuring efficient tracking of feature deployments and bug resolutions.
